Miles Sound System SDK 6.6h

Register_RIB

The function Register_RIB registers a static library RIB interface on Xbox or DOS.

void Register_RIB(
  void * static_lib_name
);

In Parameters

static_lib_name
Name of the static RIB library to load.

Discussion

On the static library versions of Miles (Xbox and DOS), you must manually load the ASI decompressors that you want to use.

This function (macro actually) takes a single paramater - the static library to load. Currently, there are just two: MP3Dec and Voice. To load one or both of these libraries, you use this function before AIL_startup. For example: 


Register_RIB(MP3Dec);
Register_RIB(Voice);
AIL_startup();


Group: System Services
Related Functions: AIL_startup
Related Basic Types: void, void *
Related FAQs: How do I initialize the Miles Sound System for use?
